title: Does anyone know when Star Guardian Poppy will be released?
body: I was just wondering when I could buy this awesome skin for my favorite champion :)

replies.body:
As the [Patch 6.20 Notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-620-notes#patch-upcoming-skins) state, the new Star Guardian skins will be released **sometime during** the patch. No official date is out there, so I recommend you keep your eyes on [the news](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/)!

Let me know if you have any questions.

Ivern was just released today, and in order to give him time to shine, they'll delay the star guardians till the end of this week or even start of next, maybe. (Some of that was taken from a red, some of it was speculation)

That being said, it's good business sense. People aren't gonna be willing to drop the RP for Candy King and Star Guardian skins at the same time. Though I do wish the release schedule was reversed... I'd love to be playing as the Star Guardians today!
